name: Slime Conquest
description:
Slime Conquest is a 2D Platformer with special Blocks which gives you Special Effects.

The Goal of the Game is to reach the Trophy at the end of each level. In this Prototype we have included level 1-0 (Turorial) and level 1-1 (First Level from World 1). If you like that game and have ideas to make it better and even more fun you can write us a short feedback comment down here or by  filling out our feedback form here.

We would like if you enjoy that game. If so we will start working on a full version of Slime Conquest. In the full version there will be much more features like:

  • Items
  • More Enemys
  • More Level and Worlds
  • Better Gameplay
  • Improved Graphics
  • Extended Settings
  • And more!

This is an really early Prototype and can contain many bugs.
